== Tools ==

=== '''`hlsbu`''' -- ECMWF system billing units used in a HIRLAM experiment ===

''hlsbu'' scans the log files of a HIRLAM experiment (html logs) and determines the sum
of the SBUs used by the experiment. Intermediate sums for each log file are listed, too. Type [[Color(green, hlsbu -help)]] for the manual page.
